item.title: Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko for PS4 now available
item.content:encoded:
• PS4

Exorcise demons to protect the town.

The PlayStation 4 version of Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko, the fully voiced ASMR short novel game starring Virtual YouTuber Natsume Kamishiro, is now available via PlayStation Store for $24.99 / £15.99 / €19.99 / 2,420 yen, Rabbitfoot announced.

Natsume Ryoran: Romance of Hi-Spec Yoko first launched for Switch and PC via Steam, DLsite, andBOOTH on October 10, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Rabbitfoot:

About

“High-spec fox swordswoman… It’s Lady Natsume Kamishiro!”

VTuber Natsume Kamishiro stars in an ASMR visual novel game! Set out on a monster-slaying adventure with the innocent and carefree fox spirit Natsume! Some of the lines are recorded in an ASMR, allowing you to enjoy intimate and rich communication with Natsume Kamishiro.

Story

The fox spirit “Natsume Kamishiro” is both your partner and a long-time childhood friend with a complicated history. As demon hunters you both bear the significant responsibility of “exorcising demons” to protect the town.

However…

Natsume, under the guise of a “patrol” around the city, will drag you all over the place. A shopping district with an amusement park!? A park with a pool!? A card shop!? For Natsume, dealing with monsters is of no concern!

High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the carefree Natsume, you’ll still carry out your duty of monster extermination…

Character

  • Natsume Kamishiro (voiced by Natsume Kamishiro) – “Alright, let’s go play right away… I mean, let’s go on patrol!” High-spec and bewitching! Even while being tossed around by the innocent and carefree Natsume, you carry out your duty of fighting against monsters… A childhood friend who loves you very much and never misses a day of showing their affection.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/natsume-ryoran-romance-of-hi-spec-yoko-for-ps4-now-available

item.title: PS5 shipments top 80.3 million
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

2.5 million units shipped during three months ended June 30, 2025.

PlayStation 5 has shipped 80.3 million units worldwide, Sony announced in its financial results for the three months ended June 30, 2025.

A total of 2.5 million PlayStation 5 units were shipped during the three months ended June 30, 2025, which is up 0.1 million from the same period the previous fiscal year.

Here are a couple of additional statistics:

  • There are 123 million monthly active users on PlayStation Network as of June 30, 2025, which is up seven million from the 116 million active users during the same period the previous fiscal year.
  • PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 software combined sold 65.9 million units during the three months ended June 30, 2025, which is up 12.3 million from the 53.6 million software sold during the same period the previous fiscal year. 6.9 million units were first-party titles, which is up 0.9 million from the 6.0 million units sold during the same period the previous fiscal year. 83 percent of software sales were full game software digital downloads, which is up three percent from the same period the previous fiscal year.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/ps5-shipments-top-80-3-million

item.title: The Battle Cats 3D action puzzle spin-off Let’s Go Mightycat! announced for Apple Arcade
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Due out on August 7.

PONOS has announced The Battle Cats 3D action puzzle spin-off Let’s Go Mightycat! for Apple Arcade. It is due out on August 7 in over 150 countries.

Here is an overview of the game, via Apple Arcade:

About

Mightycat from hit tower defense game The Battle Cats gets their own spin-off?!

An everyday freeloading Cat is transformed into a hero, and ends up getting wrapped up in a quest to conquer the entire galaxy under the command of the whimsical Super Cat God.

Key Features

  • Quick and Casual 3D Puzzler – A simple tap launches Mightycat and sends blocks they hit tumbling to the ground!
  • A Variety of Stages – All kinds of colorful stages await Mightycat to challenge your skills!
  • Tons of Items to Collect – Collect stylish Capes for Mightycat to wear! Rescue Friends and take them along on your adventures! Decorate Mightycat’s room however you like with the crazy Furniture you collect!

Let’s go Mightycat! Every planet in the cosmos will soon be under the Cat Empire’s paw!

Watch the launch trailer below.

Launch Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/the-battle-cats-3d-action-puzzle-spin-off-lets-go-mightycat-announced-for-apple-arcade

item.title: Narrative adventure game FARAWAY TRAIN coming to PS5, Xbox Series in 2025
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

Publisher AMATA Games and developer Tatamibeya will release atmospheric narrative adventure game FARAWAY TRAIN for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series in 2025, the companies announced.

FARAWAY TRAIN first launched for PC via Steam on June 3, 2021.

Here is an overview of the game, via AMATA Games:

About

In a train that runs forever, follow the fall of an empire that had boasted of its glory for a long time, and the clues of a noble girl who was forgotten and tossed about by history.

At the end of it all, the train arrives at…

FARAWAY TRAIN is an atmospheric narrative adventure game.

You wake up in an unfamiliar, old-fashioned train and are asked to trace the ephemeral life of Empress Roxelana, who led the world into collapse by using an ancient magical device called the “Nebula Astronomical Disc.” Search the train for clues to uncover the date and location where she used the device.

Along the way, there will be locked cabin doors that impede your progress. The date of each turning point in Roxelana’s life serves as the key to opening these doors. Find and enter the number representing these dates to unlock each door while unraveling more of the story behind the abandoned Empress and the magical device.

As you explore the train, the beautiful, vast scenery outside the train windows will continuously change with procedural generation.
Enjoy the unique scenery spreading out endlessly outside; you will never see the same landscape twice.

The game also offers a Free Mode where the player can freely walk around the train, sit in any seat, look out the train window, and read the ePUB file.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series Announce Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/narrative-adventure-game-faraway-train-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-in-2025
